meanings.sent1: The farmer owned a large acreage of land.
meanings.sent2: The real estate agent showed us a property with vast acreage.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel was amazed by the vast acreage of nuts in the forest.
meanings.sent4: Her love for gardening extended to an acreage of colorful flowers.
meanings.sent5: The old barn stood lonely in the vast acreage of the farm.

meanings.sent1: The acreage of the field was perfect for planting crops.
meanings.sent2: The surveyor calculated the acreage of the entire property.
meanings.sent3: The ants worked tirelessly to explore the vast acreage of the backyard.
meanings.sent4: The acreage of the park seemed to stretch endlessly into the horizon.
meanings.sent5: The farmer proudly displayed his vast acreage of harvested wheat.
